record.title: HONORING PERCY LAVON JULIAN

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate proceed to the immediate consideration of H. Con. Res. 34, at the desk and just received from the House.

record.chair: The clerk will report the concurrent resolution by title.
record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate proceeded to consider the concurrent resolution.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the concurrent resolution be agreed to, the motion to reconsider be laid upon the table, without any intervening action or debate.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
